title: Executive Order 5703-Power-Site Restoration No. 463, Wyoming
content: So much of the orders of April 12, 1910, creating Temporary Power-Site Withdrawal No. 137, and July 2, 1910, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 137, as affects the lands hereinafter described is hereby revoked:
T. 39 N., R. 94 W., sec. 7, lot 3.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5703-Power-Site Restoration No. 463, Wyoming Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361283
